title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-16.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-16.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(1)

These
regulations apply to all providers certified by the New York Office for People

With Developmental Disabilities (OPWDD), pursuant to section
16.03
(a)(5)
of the Mental Hygiene Law, to provide

Crisis Services for Individuals with Intellectual and/or Developmental

Disabilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
§§
635-16.1

Adopted

New

York State Register January 6, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 01, eff. 1/6/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
